House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05190
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING THE USE OF URBAN FARMING IN THE COUNTRY'S METROPOLITAN AREAS TO ADDRESS FOOD SECURITY CONCERNS AND REGENERATE ECOSYSTEM FUNCTIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR ANY OTHER PURPOSE
SHORT TITLE : “ The Urban Agriculture Act Of 2017 ”
ABSTRACT : Defines the terms “Urban Agriculture” and “Vertical Farming”; Involves the application of intensive production methods such as the using and reusing of urban sources and wastes; Also involves animal husbandry aquaculture, agro-forestry and horticulture; Employs the concepts of indoor agriculture in skyscrapers and other modern buildings; Integrates these methods in the academic curriculum of Institutions studying courses on Agriculture; Practical Arts, Home Economics, etc., and also incorporates its concept in the NSTP or the CMT.
